name: Space Arkanoid 0.1
description:
Hi! I am a novice indie developer, I love retro games very much. So I have prepared for you an Arkanoid game in space style! This is a mini-game with only 1 level. It won't take you more than 15 minutes to complete it. All the sprites are hand-drawn (although I'm not an artist), and it also has one boss! If you want to support me, buy my game, and then maybe I'll keep working on it!

The goal of the game is to earn 3000 points, either break 170 blocks or shoot down 10 aliens. At the end of the game, you will have a boss fight!

Control 

A - Left

D - Right

If you have ammo on the Shift button you can shoot

Thanks for the music 

https://nicolemariet.itch.io/
